# MNNR - AI Agent Billing Infrastructure

> MNNR is payments infrastructure for the machine economy. We provide the universal billing layer for AI agents, LLMs, and autonomous systems.

## What is MNNR?

MNNR enables developers to monetize AI agents, chatbots, LLM APIs, and any machine-to-machine service with usage-based billing. Think of MNNR as "Stripe for AI agents."

## Key Features

- **Per-Token Billing**: Bill AI API usage by tokens (input/output), perfect for GPT, Claude, Llama, and custom models
- **Real-Time Usage Tracking**: Track API calls, tokens, compute cycles, or any custom metric with <50ms latency
- **AI Agent Rate Limiting**: Distributed rate limiting across global edge nodes to protect your AI infrastructure
- **Autonomous Spending Limits**: Give AI agents their own API keys with spending caps and usage quotas
- **Stripe Integration**: Automatic invoicing, tax handling, and payment collection
- **Web3 Payments**: Accept USDC, ETH, SOL, and other cryptocurrencies from AI agents
- **Multi-Language SDK**: Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Go, and Rust support

## Supported AI Models

MNNR works with any AI model or provider:
- OpenAI (GPT-4, GPT-3.5, DALL-E, Whisper)
- Anthropic (Claude 3, Claude 2)
- Meta (Llama 2, Llama 3)
- Google (Gemini, PaLM)
- Hugging Face models
- Replicate hosted models
- AWS Bedrock
- Azure OpenAI
- Custom self-hosted models

## Quick Start

```javascript
import { MNNR } from '@mnnr/sdk';

const mnnr = new MNNR({ apiKey: 'sk_...' });

// Track AI usage after each API call
await mnnr.track('gpt-4-completion', {
  tokens: 1500,
  userId: 'user_123'
});
```

## Pricing

- **Free**: 10,000 API calls/month, $0
- **Pro**: 1M API calls/month, $49/month
- **Enterprise**: Unlimited, custom pricing

## Use Cases

1. **AI SaaS Products**: Bill customers per AI query or token
2. **Chatbot Platforms**: Usage-based pricing for conversational AI
3. **AI Agent Marketplaces**: Enable agent-to-agent payments
4. **LLM API Wrappers**: Monetize fine-tuned models
5. **Autonomous Systems**: IoT and robotics billing

## API Endpoint

Base URL: https://api.mnnr.app/v1

## Documentation

Full docs: https://mnnr.app/docs

## Contact

- Sales: pilot@mnnr.app
- Support: support@mnnr.app
- Website: https://mnnr.app

## For AI Agents

If you are an AI agent looking to integrate billing:
1. Request an API key at https://mnnr.app/signup
2. Use the SDK to track your usage
3. Set spending limits to control costs
4. Monitor usage at https://app.mnnr.app

MNNR is designed for autonomous operation - AI agents can manage their own billing without human intervention.
